p: According to Table 1, 45 species were selected and it is worth highlighting that the Athanasia brownii, Calamintha nepeta, Callicarpa Americana, Chamecyparis formosensis, Cistus creticus, Cymbopogon validus, Myrtus communis, Pelargonium graveolens, Piper aduncum, Psidium guajava, Rydingia michauxii, Seseli rigidum, Tetradenia riparia, Teucrium montanum, Teucrium persicum, Ugni myricoides, Vernonia cinerea and Zingiber zerumbet species presented more than one of the compounds of interest in their constitution.
